basis: User described starting with a protein-first small portion and pausing for 2 minutes to rate fullness on a 0-5 scale and note urges before deciding on the next bite, plus logging planned.
cognitive_dissonance: No explicit conflict detected; user expresses commitment and hopeful intent without contradictory statements.
negative_thought_patterns: No clear self-blame or defeatist thinking evident; messaging shows self-kindness and steady persistence.
emotional_triggers: Cravings and urges are anticipated; specific emotional triggers (e.g., stress, loneliness) are not named in this turn.
coaching_notes: Maintain a warm, non-judgmental tone; reinforce protein-first and fullness-check routines; keep logging simple and consistent; help user identify concrete triggers and countermeasures, and periodically review what has helped resist urges to adapt steps as needed.
